description.value:
You add two of the following powers to your spellbook.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.70xs2dDOM3yz6oPJ]{Chain Lightning}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.iTJB4f7PFoHayzgI]{Charm of False Heroism}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.ViXhykOnoEGw4P12]{Deceptive Shadows}
